title: Robots and Driverless Cars - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 11/27/19
itunes:title: Robots and Driverless Cars - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 11/27/19
description:
George Noory and robotics expert Dr. Daniel Wilson discuss the improvements to robotics and technology, and how major companies like Uber and Amazon are trying to replace human drivers and workers with robots.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
